short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that helps you be more mindful about meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Every Meeting Count!

Are you overwhelmed with back-to-back meetings? Do you ever wonder how much collective time is consumed by your meeting invitations? It's time to change the way we schedule!

🌟 Discover "Mindful Meetings" 🌟 – Your ultimate tool to bring mindfulness and efficiency into your meeting schedules.

🔍 What is Mindful Meetings?

Mindful Meetings is a browser extension designed to help professionals, teams, and organizations be more conscious about the cumulative time spent in meetings.

🕒 See the Big Picture

Every time you create a meeting invite, Mindful Meetings calculates and displays the cumulative time your meeting will consume across all participants. This feature encourages you to consider the total impact of your meeting on others' schedules.

💡 Key Features:

Cumulative Time Calculator: Instantly see the total time that the meeting will take across all your meeting attendees.
Privacy-Focused: We value your privacy. Mindful Meetings operates without accessing sensitive details of your meetings.

🌱 Benefits of Using Mindful Meetings:

Increase Productivity: Reduce unnecessary meetings and focus on what truly matters.
Promote Work-Life Balance: Encourage a healthier work culture by respecting everyone’s time.
Enhance Collaboration: Make meetings more purposeful and productive.
Save Time & Resources: Optimize your work day and conserve resources.

🚀 Easy to Use:

Simply add the extension to your browser, and it seamlessly integrates with your online calendar. No complicated setups!

🔗 Compatible with Google Calendar:

Mindful Meetings is designed to work seamlessly with Google Calendar.

🌐 Get Started Today!

Transform the way you schedule meetings. Be a pioneer in promoting a mindful, productive work environment. Download "Mindful Meetings" now and take the first step towards smarter scheduling!

Follow the creator on X (formerly Twitter) for more: https://twitter.com/kevingdchan
